front.title: DNS Security (DNSSEC) DNSKEY Algorithm IANA Registry Updates

abstract.t: The DNS Security Extensions (DNSSEC) require the use of cryptographic algorithm suites for generating digital signatures and cryptographic hashes over DNS data. The algorithms specified for use with DNSSEC are reflected in IANA registries. This document updates some entries in these registries. The main reason for these updates is to retire the use of SHA1.
